html:
It‚Äôs short, sweet, and to the point and I hope you join us next month for two full days, all online, with two full training tracks that can help take your Lightroom skills to the next level fast.

To reserve your ticket and save a bunch by registering early, head to kelbyonelive.com

I‚Äôm off to Venice, Italy, where I‚Äôm teaching a travel photography workshop for 12 awesome photographers. If you want to join me on a workshop in the future, be sure to get on my early notice email list at scottkelbyworkshops.com ‚Äì¬†just scroll to the bottom of the page and add your name to the email list, and you‚Äôll be among the first to know. üôÇ

Have a great weekend, everybody.

-Scott
